mixer.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a piece of equipment used to mix things together
mixer.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a piece of equipment or computer software which is used to control the sound levels or picture quality of a recording or film, or a person whose job is to use this equipment
mixer.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a drink that can be mixed with alcohol, especially to make a cocktail
mixer.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: We can use tonic water or orange juice as mixers.
mixer.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: a party held so that people who have just met can get to know each other better
mixer.translation[0].definitions[3].exam: Are you going to the freshman mixer?
